Projects & Experience.Title: Female Experiences of Online Abuse, Sexism and Trolling
Projects & Experience.Overview: Independent qualitative research study focussing on self-identifying female subjects who have both experienced and witnessed online abuse on social media platforms.
Projects & Experience.Location: School of Information, University of California, Berkeley

Projects & Experience.Title: Building a Graph-Based Text Recommender System in Python
Projects & Experience.Overview: Python project comprising a basic graph structure to traverse nodes and recommend action according to user input.
Projects & Experience.Location: Department of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science, University of California, Berkeley

Projects & Experience.Title: The Philosophy of Information and an Exploration of Search Tactics
Projects & Experience.Overview: Written reflection defining the terms 'data' and 'information' in both philosophical and computing terms, before exploring various mechanisms in which humans & computers organise, store and navigate information.
Projects & Experience.Venue: School of Information, University of California, Berkeley

Projects & Experience.Title: Blockchain Data Extraction for Crypocurrency Market Liquidity Analysis
Projects & Experience.Overview: Working with both on & off-chain data to analyse depth of liquidity in various trading markets, and inform algorithmic trading strategies.

Projects & Experience.Title: Machine Learning Approaches to Formula 1 Driver Development
Projects & Experience.Overview: Using unsupervised learning methods to identify drivers from telemetry data alone and inform the development learning cycle.
Projects & Experience.Venue: McLaren Technology Group, Surrey & London, United Kingdom

Projects & Experience.Title: Exploring the Uses of Firm-Created Big Data and Analytics in Enhancing the Measurement of Manufacturing Performance in the U.K.
Projects & Experience.Overview: MEng thesis exploring mechanisms for collecting, aggregating and utilising private & public manufacturing sector data sources in order to evaluate UK economic productivty.
Projects & Experience.Venue: Institute for Manufacturing, University of Cambridge, United Kingdom

Projects & Experience.Title: Optimising First Time Through (FTT) Production Rate in Automotive Manufacturing Through Error Classification
Projects & Experience.Overview: Categorisation of Root Cause Failure data to identify common errors and suggest appropriate pre-emptive intervention.
Projects & Experience.Venue: Leading Automotive Manufacturer & Institute for Manufacturing, University of Cambridge, United Kingdom
